ComicInfo.Summary:
Another year is coming to a close-which means it's time to find out who's on this year's list of the dumbest people, events and things of 2017! So much to choose from!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:30:27. [Issue ID 647919]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mad-549-the-20-dumbest-people-events-and-things-of/4000-647919/
